history.proof: intros. unfold induced_function. unfold quotient_projection. qsimpl time: 1 use: quotient_projection_correct. sfirstorder use: equality_of_equiv_class_impl_R, @Build_equivalence unfold: relation, Relation.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "proj1_sig (quotient_projection ?M1668 ?M1669)" in the current goal.

original: intros. intro x. unfold induced_function. unfold quotient_projection. rewrite quotient_projection_correct. unfold equiv_class. unfold proj1_sig. pose proof (description_of_fbar (quotient_projection R x)) as H. destruct H as [y [x' [H1 H2]]]. unfold induced_function. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
